creator: arekm@maven.pl
text:
When accessing http://server//aaa/bbb/file.html httpd tries to open path-to-
virtual/bbb/file.html. It always strips first part of path if double slash is 
used. This happens in apache 2.1: http://svn.northnitch.com//there-is-some-bug-
in-apr/index.html and in apache 2.0 (ported to APR 1.0 API): http://bugs.pld-
linux.org//aaaa/index.php.

Bug 28450 related.
